errors.error_description: Shows running 'python setup.py install' after 'pip install markdown' which is incorrect order and redundant
correction_candidates: Remove the 'python setup.py install' line entirely
Replace both commands with 'pip install markdown' only
Move 'python setup.py install' before 'pip install markdown'
Change to 'pip install -e .' for development installation
errors.golden_answer: Remove the 'python setup.py install' line entirely

errors.error_description: The 'python setup.py install' command is outdated and may cause installation issues
